System.M_NAME001: SELECT COALESCE(M.NAMECLS_CODE, '') AS NAMECLS_CODE , COALESCE(N.NAMECLS_NAME, '') AS NAMECLS_NAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_CODE, '') AS NAME_CODE , COALESCE(M.NAME_NAME, '') AS NAME_NAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_RNAME, '') AS NAME_RNAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_PNAME, '') AS NAME_PNAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_TNAME, '') AS NAME_TNAME , COALESCE(M.DEFAULT_TYPE, '') AS DEFAULT_TYPE , COALESCE(M.DSP_FLG, '') AS DSP_FLG , COALESCE(M.DSPORDER_NO, 0) AS DSPORDER_NO , COALESCE(M.NAMETYPE, '') AS NAMETYPE , COALESCE(M.ADD_USER, '') AS ADD_USER , COALESCE(M.ADD_PC, '') AS ADD_PC , COALESCE(M.ADD_DATE, 0) AS ADD_DATE , COALESCE(M.ADD_TIME, 0) AS ADD_TIME , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_USER, '') AS LASTUP_USER , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_PC, '') AS LASTUP_PC , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_DATE, 0) AS LASTUP_DATE , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_TIME, 0) AS LASTUP_TIME , COALESCE(E_ADD_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS ADD_USER_VIEW , COALESCE(E_LASTUP_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS LASTUP_USER_VIEW FROM M_NAME M LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_ADD_USER ON M.ADD_USER = E_ADD_USER.EMP_USER LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_LASTUP_USER ON M.LASTUP_USER = E_LASTUP_USER .EMP_USER LEFT JOIN M_NAMECLS N ON M.NAMECLS_CODE = N.NAMECLS_CODE
System.M_NAME002: SELECT COALESCE(M.NAMECLS_CODE, '') AS NAMECLS_CODE , COALESCE(M.NAME_CODE, '') AS NAME_CODE , COALESCE(M.NAME_NAME, '') AS NAME_NAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_RNAME, '') AS NAME_RNAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_PNAME, '') AS NAME_PNAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_TNAME, '') AS NAME_TNAME , COALESCE(M.DEFAULT_TYPE, '') AS DEFAULT_TYPE , COALESCE(M.DSP_FLG, '') AS DSP_FLG , COALESCE(M.DSPORDER_NO, 0) AS DSPORDER_NO , COALESCE(M.NAMETYPE, '') AS NAMETYPE , COALESCE(M.ADD_USER, '') AS ADD_USER , COALESCE(M.ADD_PC, '') AS ADD_PC , COALESCE(M.ADD_DATE, 0) AS ADD_DATE , COALESCE(M.ADD_TIME, 0) AS ADD_TIME , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_USER, '') AS LASTUP_USER , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_PC, '') AS LASTUP_PC , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_DATE, 0) AS LASTUP_DATE , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_TIME, 0) AS LASTUP_TIME , COALESCE(E_ADD_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS ADD_USER_VIEW , COALESCE(E_LASTUP_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS LASTUP_USER_VIEW FROM M_NAME M LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_ADD_USER ON M.ADD_USER = E_ADD_USER.EMP_USER LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_LASTUP_USER ON M.LASTUP_USER = E_LASTUP_USER.EMP_USER WHERE M.NAMECLS_CODE = ? AND M.NAME_CODE = ?
System.M_NAME003: INSERT INTO M_NAME ( NAMECLS_CODE , NAME_CODE , NAME_NAME , NAME_RNAME , NAME_PNAME , NAME_TNAME , DEFAULT_TYPE , DSP_FLG , DSPORDER_NO , NAMETYPE , ADD_USER , ADD_PC , ADD_DATE , ADD_TIME , LASTUP_USER , LASTUP_PC , LASTUP_DATE , LASTUP_TIME ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
System.M_NAME004: UPDATE M_NAME SET NAMECLS_CODE = ? , NAME_CODE = ? , NAME_NAME = ? , NAME_RNAME = ? , NAME_PNAME = ? , NAME_TNAME = ? , DEFAULT_TYPE = ? , DSP_FLG = ? , DSPORDER_NO = ? , NAMETYPE = ? , LASTUP_USER = ? , LASTUP_PC = ? , LASTUP_DATE = ? , LASTUP_TIME = ? WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = ? AND NAME_CODE = ?
System.M_NAME005: DELETE FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = ? AND NAME_CODE = ?
System.M_NAME007: SELECT M.NAME_CODE , M.NAMECLS_CODE FROM M_NAME AS M $WHERE ORDER BY M.NAME_CODE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
System.M_NAME009: SELECT COALESCE(M.NAMECLS_CODE, '') AS NAMECLS_CODE , COALESCE(N.NAMECLS_NAME, '') AS NAMECLS_NAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_CODE, '') AS NAME_CODE , COALESCE(M.NAME_NAME, '') AS NAME_NAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_RNAME, '') AS NAME_RNAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_PNAME, '') AS NAME_PNAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_TNAME, '') AS NAME_TNAME , COALESCE(M.DEFAULT_TYPE, '') AS DEFAULT_TYPE , COALESCE(M.DSP_FLG, '') AS DSP_FLG , COALESCE(M.DSPORDER_NO, 0) AS DSPORDER_NO , COALESCE(M.NAMETYPE, '') AS NAMETYPE , COALESCE(M.ADD_USER, '') AS ADD_USER , COALESCE(M.ADD_PC, '') AS ADD_PC , COALESCE(M.ADD_DATE, 0) AS ADD_DATE , COALESCE(M.ADD_TIME, 0) AS ADD_TIME , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_USER, '') AS LASTUP_USER , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_PC, '') AS LASTUP_PC , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_DATE, 0) AS LASTUP_DATE , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_TIME, 0) AS LASTUP_TIME , COALESCE(E_ADD_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS ADD_USER_VIEW , COALESCE(E_LASTUP_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS LASTUP_USER_VIEW FROM M_NAME M LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_ADD_USER ON M.ADD_USER = E_ADD_USER.EMP_USER LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_LASTUP_USER ON M.LASTUP_USER = E_LASTUP_USER .EMP_USER LEFT JOIN M_NAMECLS N ON M.NAMECLS_CODE = N.NAMECLS_CODE
System.M_NAME010: SELECT COALESCE(M.NAMECLS_CODE, '') AS NAMECLS_CODE , COALESCE(N.NAMECLS_NAME, '') AS NAMECLS_NAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_CODE, '') AS NAME_CODE , COALESCE(M.NAME_NAME, '') AS NAME_NAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_RNAME, '') AS NAME_RNAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_PNAME, '') AS NAME_PNAME , COALESCE(M.NAME_TNAME, '') AS NAME_TNAME , COALESCE(M.DEFAULT_TYPE, '') AS DEFAULT_TYPE , COALESCE(M.DSP_FLG, '') AS DSP_FLG , COALESCE(M.DSPORDER_NO, 0) AS DSPORDER_NO , COALESCE(M.NAMETYPE, '') AS NAMETYPE , COALESCE(M.ADD_USER, '') AS ADD_USER , COALESCE(M.ADD_PC, '') AS ADD_PC , COALESCE(M.ADD_DATE, 0) AS ADD_DATE , COALESCE(M.ADD_TIME, 0) AS ADD_TIME , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_USER, '') AS LASTUP_USER , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_PC, '') AS LASTUP_PC , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_DATE, 0) AS LASTUP_DATE , COALESCE(M.LASTUP_TIME, 0) AS LASTUP_TIME , COALESCE(E_ADD_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS ADD_USER_VIEW , COALESCE(E_LASTUP_USER.EMP_NAME,'') AS LASTUP_USER_VIEW FROM M_NAME M LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_ADD_USER ON M.ADD_USER = E_ADD_USER.EMP_USER LEFT JOIN M_EMP E_LASTUP_USER ON M.LASTUP_USER = E_LASTUP_USER .EMP_USER LEFT JOIN M_NAMECLS N ON M.NAMECLS_CODE = N.NAMECLS_CODE
System.M_NAME011: UPDATE M_NAME SET NAME_NAME = ? , NAME_RNAME = ? , LASTUP_USER = ? , LASTUP_PC = ? , LASTUP_DATE = ? , LASTUP_TIME = ? WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = ? AND NAME_CODE = ?
